interpretation.zh: 紫微在命宮：為君臨天下之象。性格堅強，喜掌權，領導力強。適合從政或管理工作。
interpretation.en: Zi Wei in Life Palace: Symbol of imperial authority. Strong character, enjoys leadership, good executive ability. Suitable for politics or management.
interpretation.short: 紫微命宮：帝王氣質，領導型人才

rules.notes: One of the most auspicious placements in Ziwei system

interpretation.zh: 天機在命宮：聰慧聰慧，反應敏銳。擅長計謀，多思多慮。適合從事研究、分析工作。
interpretation.en: Tian Ji in Life Palace: Intelligent and sharp-minded. Good at planning and analysis. Suitable for research and analytical work.
interpretation.short: 天機命宮：聰慧敏銳，多思多慮

interpretation.zh: 太陽在命宮：性格開朗，樂觀積極，光明磊落。具有領導魅力和號召力。適合做公眾人物。
interpretation.en: Tai Yang in Life Palace: Outgoing and optimistic personality. Bright and straightforward. Good charisma and appeal. Suitable for public roles.
interpretation.short: 太陽命宮：光明磊落，領袖氣質

interpretation.zh: 武曲在命宮：性格堅硬，意志堅強，剛直不阿。財賦能力強。適合從商或行政管理。
interpretation.en: Wu Qu in Life Palace: Tough and determined character. Strong willpower. Good financial ability. Suitable for business or administrative roles.
interpretation.short: 武曲命宮：堅硬執著，財商卓越

interpretation.zh: 四化：祿代表順利、給予；權代表控制、權力；科代表聰慧、名譽；忌代表困難、缺乏。
interpretation.en: Four Transformations: Prosperity (Luck) = smoothness/giving; Authority (Power) = control; Science (Fame) = wisdom/reputation; Penalty (Misfortune) = difficulty/loss.
interpretation.short: 四化星：祿權科忌，人生關鍵

rules.notes: Core concept - all transformations apply to every star

interpretation.zh: 大限：十年為一個大限。每一大限主宰該十年間的主要運勢。由命宮起數，順行十二宮。
interpretation.en: Decade Luck: Each 10-year cycle is a major luck period. Determines the main fortune for that decade. Count from Life Palace, going through 12 palaces.
interpretation.short: 大限：十年一周期，人生關鍵轉折

interpretation.zh: 流年：逐年推移。每一流年在十二宮中循環，影響該年運勢。從命宮起數，反複推行。
interpretation.en: Flow Year (Annual): Progresses year by year. Each year cycles through 12 palaces, affecting that year's fortune. Counted from Life Palace in cycles.
interpretation.short: 流年：逐年推移，年度運勢掌握

interpretation.zh: 廉貞在命宮：性格複雜，感情豐富但易受傷。適合從事藝術、設計、人文工作。需注意感情穩定。
interpretation.en: Lian Zhen in Life Palace: Complex personality, emotional depth but vulnerable. Suitable for arts, design, humanities. Watch emotional stability.
interpretation.short: 廉貞命宮：感情豐富，藝術氣質

interpretation.zh: 天同在命宮：性格溫和，樂觀善良，做事穩妥但缺乏進取心。適合安穩工作，易得長上器重。
interpretation.en: Tian Dong in Life Palace: Mild and kind personality, optimistic, steady but lacking drive. Suitable for stable work, favored by superiors.
interpretation.short: 天同命宮：溫和善良，穩定踏實

interpretation.zh: 第一大限與第六大限為人生的關鍵變動期。若星曜組合不良，易遭逆境。需要謹慎應對。
interpretation.en: First and sixth decade luck are critical transition periods. Poor star combinations may lead to adversity. Caution needed.
interpretation.short: 一六大限：人生關鍵變動期，需謹慎

rules.notes: This is a disputed interpretation - some modern schools disagree

interpretation.zh: 七殺在命宮：性格果敢，決斷力強，但易顯得剛硬。適合軍警、執法工作。需約束個性。
interpretation.en: Qi Sha in Life Palace: Bold and decisive. Strong execution but can seem harsh. Suitable for military/law enforcement. Needs self-discipline.
interpretation.short: 七殺命宮：果敢決斷，執行力強

interpretation.zh: 破軍在命宮：性格不安，創新精神強，但易患得患失。人生起伏大，需尋求穩定。
interpretation.en: Po Jun in Life Palace: Restless nature, strong innovation drive. Ups and downs in life, needs stability.
interpretation.short: 破軍命宮：創新先鋒，人生起伏

interpretation.zh: 財帛宮主財運與物質。宮中星曜組合決定一生的財富走向。吉星聚集則富有，凶星聚集則困頓。
interpretation.en: Wealth Palace governs finances and material fortune. Star combinations determine lifetime wealth trajectory. Good stars = prosperity, bad stars = hardship.
interpretation.short: 財帛宮：掌控一生財富，關鍵指標

interpretation.zh: 火鈴與祿存：火鈴主災厄、意外，易帶來困難。祿存主財富保護，但在財帛宮不算吉星。
interpretation.en: Fire/Brightness stars bring calamity/unexpected issues. Prosperity-holding star provides protection but not always auspicious in Wealth Palace.
interpretation.short: 火鈴祿存：災難與保護的平衡

interpretation.zh: 紅鸞天喜：感情與婚姻的指標星。同時出現則感情運良好，婚姻美滿。
interpretation.en: Red Phoenix & Heavenly Joy: Indicators of romance & marriage. Both present = good relationship fortune and happy marriage.
interpretation.short: 紅鸞天喜：感情美滿，婚戀吉兆

interpretation.zh: 十二宮系統：代表人生的十二個方面。從命宮（自我）開始，順行代表不同人生領域。
interpretation.en: Twelve Palaces: Represent 12 life aspects. From Life Palace (self), progressing through different life domains.
interpretation.short: 十二宮：人生全景，命盤的骨架

rules.notes: Fundamental concept - universal in all Ziwei schools

interpretation.zh: 喜神在流年：該年運勢較佳，易有吉事發生。若再遇四化吉化則更佳。
interpretation.en: Blessing Star in Flow Year: Better fortune that year. Good events likely. Especially good with positive transformations.
interpretation.short: 喜神流年：吉事臨門，運勢向好

interpretation.zh: 官祿宮主事業與名譽。宮中星曜決定職業方向和事業成就。是論命中最重要的宮位之一。
interpretation.en: Career Palace governs profession and reputation. Palace stars determine career direction and achievement. One of the most important palaces.
interpretation.short: 官祿宮：事業前程，名譽地位

interpretation.zh: 兄弟宮主手足關係與合作運。宮中吉星則手足助力大，凶星則關係淡薄或有爭執。
interpretation.en: Siblings Palace shows relationship with siblings and collaboration. Good stars = strong support, bad stars = distant or conflicted.
interpretation.short: 兄弟宮：手足情誼，合作機遇

interpretation.zh: 夫妻宮主婚姻與伴侶。星曜組合影響結婚時機、配偶性格和婚姻品質。
interpretation.en: Marriage Palace governs marriage and spouse. Star combinations affect marriage timing, spouse personality, and marriage quality.
interpretation.short: 夫妻宮：婚姻美滿，伴侶運勢

interpretation.zh: 紫微星群：紫微在某宮必有天機相伴。紫微命宮則財帛宮必武曲、官祿宮必廉貞。三方四正互相會照，構成完整權力星群。
interpretation.en: Ziwei Group: Ziwei always has Tianjl nearby. When Ziwei is in Life Palace, Wuqu must be in Wealth Palace and Lianzheng in Career Palace. Forms complete power configuration.
interpretation.short: 紫微星群：權力氣度，帝王格局

interpretation.zh: 天府星群：天府命宮則官祿宮必天相、遷移宮必七殺、夫妻宮必破軍。形成管理與權力組合，適合中高階主管職位。
interpretation.en: Tianfu Group: When Tianfu is in Life Palace, Tianxiang must be in Career, Qisha in Migration, Pojun in Marriage. Management and authority configuration.
interpretation.short: 天府星群：穩定管理，中高階主管

condition.condition_description: Four major star groups in Ziwei system

interpretation.zh:
四大星群分類：
1. 紫微、武曲、廉貞、天府、天相一組
2. 貪狼、七殺、破軍一組
3. 天機、天同、太陰、天梁一組
4. 太陽、巨門一組

第一組與第二組易同宮或互會，後兩組亦常互會。格局多來自這幾組星群的搭配。
interpretation.en:
Four Major Star Groups:
1. Ziwei/Wuqu/Lianzheng/Tianfu/Tianxiang Group (Authority)
2. Tanlang/Qisha/Pojun Group (Innovation)
3. Tianjl/Tiantong/Taiyin/Tianliang Group (Intellect)
4. Taiyang/Jumen Group (Expression)

Group 1 + 2 often meet; Groups 3 + 4 often meet. Patterns emerge from combinations.
interpretation.short: 四大星群：命盤格局的基礎框架

condition.pattern_description: All three stars in Life/Career/Wealth Palaces

interpretation.zh: 殺破狼格：七殺、破軍、貪狼輪流坐守命宮、官祿宮、財帛宮三宮。代表高度變動與破舊立新，運勢起伏大：好命很好，壞命很糟。適合冒險、創業、轉型行業，不適合求穩定終身職。
interpretation.en: Sha Po Lang Pattern: High volatility and transformation. Extreme ups and downs: excellent when good, terrible when bad. Suitable for entrepreneurship, risk-taking, career transitions. Not for seeking stability.
interpretation.short: 殺破狼格：變動多舛，大起大落

condition.pattern_description: Tianfu + Tianxiang combination in major palaces

interpretation.zh: 府相格：天府與天相形成主星組合，常見於命宮或官祿宮。作事穩重、面面俱到、善管理，適合中高階主管與組織管理職，重視人和與制度。
interpretation.en: Fu Xiang Pattern: Stable, thorough, strong management skills. Suitable for middle to senior management positions in organizations. Emphasis on relationships and systems.
interpretation.short: 府相格：穩定周全，組織管理

condition.pattern_description: Ziwei/Wuqu/Lianzheng in same palace or tri-positional

interpretation.zh: 紫武廉格：紫微、武曲、廉貞為一組星群，同宮或三方鼎立。代表氣度、權力、財政掌控能力，適合領導層、掌權職位。可與殺破狼、府相進一步組合形成複合格局。
interpretation.en: Ziwei-Wuqu-Lianzheng Pattern: Authority, power, and financial control ability. Suitable for leadership positions and decision-making roles. Can combine with Sha Po Lang or Fu Xiang patterns.
interpretation.short: 紫武廉格：氣度權勢，領導格局

condition.pattern_description: Sun and Moon mutual support in bright light position

interpretation.zh: 日月並明格：太陽與太陰互拱或同宮，且光明不受遮蔽，多伴天魁、天鉞等吉曜。古稱貴格，主聰明、名望與貴人。需視所在宮位與是否受煞忌影響。
interpretation.en: Sun-Moon Brilliance Pattern: Sun and Moon together in bright, unobstructed positions, often with Tianku and Tianyue. Classical auspicious pattern: intelligence, fame, and noble support.
interpretation.short: 日月並明：聰慧名望，貴人相助

interpretation.zh: 天刑天姚對星：天刑屬陽火自律，天姚屬陰水放縱，為本質相反對星。兩星同宮或互會時，在「自律 vs 享樂」之間拉扯。天刑遇昌曲可變成紀律而不殘酷。
interpretation.en: Tianxing-Tianyao Opposition: Tianxing (discipline, Yang Fire) vs Tianyao (indulgence, Yin Water). Tension between self-control and pleasure. Tianxing with Wenchang/Wenqu becomes disciplined without harshness.
interpretation.short: 天刑天姚：自律與享樂的拉扯

interpretation.zh: 天刑見昌曲：天刑在寅卯酉戌入廟，與文昌、文曲成對會照或同度。主「職掌邊疆」，多為武職文官，如海關、移民官。自律但不帶肅殺之氣。
interpretation.en: Tianxing with Wenchang/Wenqu in Yin/Mao/You/Xu (exalted): Jurisdiction over borders. Martial civil officials like customs, immigration. Disciplined but without harshness.
interpretation.short: 天刑昌曲：職掌邊疆，武職文官

interpretation.zh: 太陽巨門天刑同會：為「司刑法之星」，多主從事法律、司法、裁判等工作。
interpretation.en: Taiyang-Jumen-Tianxing Together: Law and justice stars. Primarily law, judiciary, arbitration careers.
interpretation.short: 司刑法之星：法律司法工作

interpretation.zh: 太陽天梁天刑同會見煞忌：主「官司詞訟」，多涉訴訟糾紛，而非職業司刑。與太陽巨門天刑不同。
interpretation.en: Taiyang-Tianliang-Tianxing with afflictions: Litigation and disputes. Differs from Taiyang-Jumen-Tianxing which indicates law careers.
interpretation.short: 官司詞訟：訴訟糾紛困擾

interpretation.zh: 紫微會貪狼加天刑：紫微會貪狼於子午，或同貪狼於卯酉，且喜見天刑。本來易成桃花犯主，但遇天刑時傾向「自律」，減低桃色是非，變成對感情有節制的人。
interpretation.en: Ziwei with Tanlang and Tianxing: Naturally prone to romantic entanglements, but Tianxing's discipline reduces indiscretion. Results in restraint in relationships.
interpretation.short: 紫微貪狼天刑：感情節制，避免桃花
